players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."

Bob: "Let's vote Charlie out now. No more discussion needed."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
